summary: Lady Mary Lasenby is a spoiled maiden who always gets her way until shipwrecked with her butler, then learns which qualities are really admirable in a person.
cast: Thomas Meighan|Theodore Roberts|Raymond Hatton|Robert Cain|Gloria Swanson|Lila Lee|Bebe Daniels|Julia Faye|Rhy Darby|Mildred Reardon|Mayme Kelso|Edmund Burns|Henry Woodward|Sydney Deane|Wesley Barry|Edna Mae Cooper|Lillian Leighton|Guy Oliver|Clarence Burton|Lawson Butt|Kamuela C. Searle
title: Macho y hembra
